title: Shigoto Kaeri, Dokushin No Bijin Doushi Ni Tanomarete
alternative_title: 仕事帰り、独身の美人上司に頼まれて ; Shigoto Kaeri, Dokushin no Bijin Doushi ni Tanomarete ; On My Way Home from Work, My Beautiful Single Boss Asked Me to Do Something for Her
status: 仕事帰り、独身の美人上司に頼まれて ; Shigoto Kaeri, Dokushin no Bijin Doushi ni Tanomarete ; On My Way Home from Work, My Beautiful Single Boss Asked Me to Do Something for Her
description:
Description :
        One day, a young clerk named Haruhiko was suddenly asked by his boss to do one thing: get her pregnant.“We have nothing to do with anything else… We just have to do it, that is, you have to get me pregnant, and I have your baby.The loveless relationship between the two had begun. Although the condition was not to fall in love with each other, the distance between the two gradually narrowed.The romance story between a lucky worker and a beautiful boss. It has officially begun.
